tx.help: TX pin for serial connection to external device (WizFi310)

rx.help: RX pin for serial connection to external device (WizFi310)

rts.help: RTS pin for serial connection to external device (WizFi310)

cts.help: CTS pin for serial connection to external device (WizFi310)

rst.help: RST pin for module hardware reset (WizFi310).

max-heap-usage.help: Maximum heap usage allowed for each instance of this driver.

event-queue-size.help: Size of the event queue (this should contain at most <placeholder> items).

stacksize.help: Stack size of the event queue dispatcher thread.

connect-max-attempt.help: Maximum number of time a connect will try before returning error.
